The MEME Suite

Motif-based sequence analysis tools

log-hmm

Usage:

log-hmm [options] <hmm file>

Description

This program converts an HMM file generated by mhmm from probabilities to log probabilities.

Inputs

<hmm file>

A file containing the description of an HMM in mhmm format.

Outputs

The program prints to standard output the same HMM but with log probabilities rather then probabilities.

Options

Option Parameter Description Default Behavior
General Options
